com.amazon.speech.speechlet.verifier

Interface SpeechletRequestEnvelopeVerifier

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ApplicationIdSpeechletRequestEnvelopeVerifier, SpeechletRequestVerifierWrapper

    public interface SpeechletRequestEnvelopeVerifier
    Verifier for validating the received SpeechletRequestEnvelopes from the devices.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean verify(SpeechletRequestEnvelope<?> speechletRequestEnvelope)
      Verifies a SpeechletRequest within the context of the Session in which it was received.

    • Method Detail

      • verify

        boolean verify(SpeechletRequestEnvelope<?> speechletRequestEnvelope)
        Verifies a SpeechletRequest within the context of the Session in which it was received. Returns true if the verify succeeded, false otherwise.
        Parameters:
        speechletRequestEnvelope - the speechlet request envelope to verify
        Returns:
        true if the verify succeeded, false otherwise
